description.S1: You've found all the beacons for the treasure hunt.
description.S2: Return to Alonzo to get your prize.

blurb.B1: After the player has activated the fourth beacon,
blurb.B2: they can eturn to Alonzo and speak with him to find out the tour is fake, and was shut down long ago by The Board.
blurb.B3: Alonzo will then admit that they did not expect the player to survive,
blurb.B4: and had been using the beacon to record footage of mercenaries dying gruesomely to sell on Byzantium.
blurb.B5: However, Alonzo will reluctantly give the player the Certified Explorer's Hat,

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, it's you. I suppose you're here to collect your prize, hmm?

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: I really do have the worst luck. When I gave you this job, I never expected you'd be so damned competent.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: I don't care, Alonzo. Just give me my hat, and I'll be on my way.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Yes, go on and gloat. You've already ruined all my plans with your talent for staying alive.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: The tour's not real, friend. Board shut it down years ago due to unacceptably high rates of fatalities. So I greased a few palms and got the tour up and running again.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: I outfitted every beacon with a recording device. Live footage of dimwitted mercenaries dying in gruesome ways across Halcyon. Imagine the ratings!

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: There's no way this is legal.

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: Aw, that's so sad. Can I have my hat now?

dialog.speaker: Player
dialog.utterance: You tried to get me killed? Are you crazy?

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Why the hell shouldn't it be legal? I filed the appropriate paperwork. I paid my dues.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Look, never mind. Just take your reward and get out of my hair.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: One Certified Explorer's Hat, courtesy of the Bureau of Exploration. With my compliments.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Fine, fine. You're entitled to your reward.

dialog.speaker: AlonzoVallejos (Male)
dialog.utterance: Oh, come on. I would've made your death worth millions.
